author: Staff Reporter
text:
S. Gunabalan (30) of Kaliappanur in Thekkampatty Panchayat near Mettupalayam reportedly ended his life by consuming poison after throwing his daughters Monisha (2) and Nisha (6-month-old) in a well on Tuesday evening.

Mettupalayam police said that the man, who works in a private company, used to frequently quarrel with his wife Surya (25).

He is said to have taken the extreme step after his wife went to the Thudiyalur All Woman Police Station to lodge a complaint against him. Villagers, who came to know that he consumed poison, rushed him to a private hospital at Karamadai, where he died. His body was taken to Mettupalayam Government Hospital for post-mortem examination.

Fire and rescue services personnel were trying to retrieve bodies of the two girls from the well.
title: Man throws daughters into well, commits suicide
